Package io.github.ai4ci.functions

package io.github.ai4ci.functions
Package containing mathematical function implementations and utilities for the AI4CI framework.

Current Unified Architecture:

  1. Core Function Interface: SimpleFunction with basic evaluation capability
  2. Function Implementations:
    • EmpiricalFunction - Piecewise interpolation from data points
    • MathematicalFunction - Mathematical expressions using mxparser
    • FixedValueFunction - Constant value provider
    • DelayDistribution - Time-to-event probability distributions
  3. Distribution Hierarchy: Complex probability distributions extending statistical framework
  4. Unified Interpolation System:

Improvement Opportunities:

  1. Function Composition: Add support for building complex functions from simpler ones
  2. Enhanced Serialisation: Improve JSON type resolution consistency
  3. Mathematical Operations: Extend interface with common transformations
  4. Performance Optimisation: Add caching and lazy evaluation strategies

Specific TODOs for Enhancement (Post-Consolidation):

  1. Create CompositeFunction interface supporting: \[ f(x) = g(h(x)) \quad \text{and} \quad f(x) = a \cdot g(x) + b \]
  2. Implement FunctionRegistry for dynamic function creation
  3. Add caching decorator pattern for expensive function evaluations
  4. Create validation framework with domain checking
  5. Standardise mathematical documentation with LaTeX formulae

    Resolution strategies for duplicate transformed x keys.

    A delay distribution representing a probability distribution in discrete time conditional on an event happening.

    A discrete mathematical function defined by a univariate expression.

    Interface for probability distributions used in the modeling framework.

    Empirical probability distribution constructed from sample data or from x / F(x) pairs.

    A simple empirical function defined by a set of (x,y) coordinates.

    An empirical kernel function.
    FixedValueFunction
    A simple function that always returns a fixed value.
    GaussianKernel
    Gaussian kernel function.
    Interpolator
    Interface for mathematical interpolation functions.
    Interpolators
    Enumeration of supported interpolation methods for interpolation of functions from discrete data points.
    KernelFunction
    Interface for kernel functions that operate on discrete integer ranges.
    LinearInterpolator
    A linear interpolator implementation that performs piecewise linear interpolation between given data points.
    LinkFunction
    Link functions used to transform domain and range values for interpolation and statistical fitting.
    LoessInterpolator
    Local regression (LOESS) interpolator for one-dimensional data.
    MathematicalFunction
    A mathematical function that can be evaluated at runtime.
    ResampledDistribution
    A resampled distribution formed by combining samples from two distributions using a binary combiner function.
    SimpleDistribution
    Specify distributions and parameters in a way that makes configuring them in a JSON file is relatively straightforward.

    SimpleDistribution.PointDistribution
    Configuration for a Point Distribution, which always returns the same value.

    SimpleDistribution.UniformDistribution

    SimpleDistribution.UnimodalBetaDistribution
    Configuration for a Unimodal Beta Distribution
    SimpleFunction
    Interface for simple mathematical functions that map a single input to a single output.
